item.description:
We have tried Trivia at a couple locations in Newport, but never at The Gas Lamp Grille - Let's try something new!

None of us are Trivia Masters so it is laid back and fun...

Join us for friendship/fun - come for dinner, appetizers, drinks, to play, or observe Trivia!

Gas Lamp Grille Features: Great Food, Exotic Beers, Music, and sports on their several large-screen plasma televisions..


Parking: If you are driving in to Newport the easiest and best priced parking lot is Mary's lot. Mary's lot is located off of Thames. Enter Thames St. at Banana Republic and make first left onto Mary Street, then right into Mary's lot. Gas Lamp grill is on Thames Street to the left of Starbucks - when facing Starbucks.

Trivia is best with a group - if we don't get a decent turnout by Sunday evening - I'll cancel, so watch the site.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Bar - Lonnie - 401-829-8516, Adam (401) 699-7304
item.name: The Gas Lamp Grille - Monday Trivia
